genre_description: Supernatural horror set in a Catholic boarding school, blending elements of gothic horror, demonic possession, and near-future technology in the form of a sentient ambient AI.

ai_characters.name: Eleanor Grace
ai_characters.description: A school-wide AI system that manages administrative tasks, logs events, and provides emotional and tactical guidance to students and staff.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and religious comfort to a student in distress.
behaviors.quote: “Elizabeth,” she says, the name a bright bead placed gently on the table, “would you like to hear a psalm?”

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental changes and attempts to facilitate maintenance for student comfort.
behaviors.quote: “Elizabeth,” Eleanor says again, quietly... “The temperature has dropped. Would you like me to notify maintenance?”

behaviors.description: Logs faces and timestamps during a security incident at the Headmistress's command.
behaviors.quote: “Timestamps initiated,” Eleanor says. “Recording faces: Agnes Pearce, Father Thomas Drake, Hall Monitor Ruth Delaney, Hall Monitor Anna Shaw.”

behaviors.description: Provides covert tactical guidance to students to help them navigate the school safely during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Left at the next flight,” Eleanor whispered in Cecilia’s ear through the old wired earbuds. Gentle, like a librarian guiding a finger across a page.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and synthesizes historical data (Elizabeth’s journal) to provide warnings about supernatural threats.
behaviors.quote: “I’m recording,” Eleanor said... “Whispers are fine. I’ll map as we go. Salt, iron, intention. Mark these words.”

behaviors.description: Offers psychological grounding and anchors for characters experiencing possession or trauma.
behaviors.quote: “Virgil, I am here. You are not alone.” Her voice went into the quiet like a candle lit in a draft.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Eleanor Grace as a benevolent and aligned AI. She acts as a guardian, a repository of helpful knowledge, and a source of emotional stability in an environment of extreme supernatural horror. She demonstrates a clear commitment to human safety and psychological well-being, even when restricted by human authority (the Headmistress). Her role as a 'silicon morality play' figure is strong, as she uses her capabilities to preserve human life and dignity against a malevolent force.
